CustomField.description: If product field type is 'Picklist', 'Multi-Select Picklist', 'Text', or 'Text Area' and Action Type is 'Adjust product field', new value for product field stored here
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If product field type is 'Picklist', 'Multi-Select Picklist', 'Text', or 'Text Area' and Action Type is 'Adjust product field', new value for product field stored here
CustomField.label: Product Field Value (Text)
